title: what a joke of a game
body:
janna broken as fuck since realese alongside with every other enchanter supports with a toxic /overaloded kit and mechanic
 riot stat that they know that janna is broken
they dont do anything , u have acutly to wait another season in order for them to give u a shitty sheild item
i love losing my games to a fking braindead supp and i already ban lulu everysingle game
srsly pepole who play janna and think they are climbing cause they are good need a real help 
u acutly dont get anything u dont learn anything , u just press E and that's it braindead toxic and non interactive champ , this game have the shitiest shieild powercreep ive ever seen
in fact other games suffer from the lack of sheilds that to see a healer class is rare and needed 
in leauge u dont get to play one game without a fking full hp sheild and heal imagin how this shit would be if it were in an mmo game 
a ranged class one shotting everyone while restoring full hp it would be fun right and even funnier for melle champs

replies.body: I was about to be onboard with you until I saw _Janna_, of all the broken bullshit champions in this game, is the one you were complaining about. I mean HotS has a character who literally gets her full health as a shield and it lasts longer than Janna's, and people shut her down. Janna's pretty easy to lane against if you pick your opportunities. You just can't rubberneck and hope to walk through the lane against her.
{{champion:40}} and {{champion:117}} are mechanically intensive and have high skill ceilings. They are very hard to play.

> [{quoted}](name=Colton147,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OMzFJEZa,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-27T02:07:58.760+0000)
>
> {{champion:40}} and {{champion:117}} are mechanically intensive and have high skill ceilings. They are very hard to play.

ur being sarcastic right? atleast i hope so
might as well go afk when i see janna on the enemy team
Have you tried uninstalling and playing anything else?

> [{quoted}](name=Sp33d Zer0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OMzFJEZa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-27T02:05:04.166+0000)
>
> Have you tried uninstalling and playing anything else?

sure i should uninstall the game cause my role wasnt godly randomly picked for being broken 
or cause balance team dosnt care about the stat of the game

> in leauge u dont get to play one game without a fking full hp sheild and heal imagin how this shit would be if it were in an mmo game

There is no such thing as a MMO anywhere _near_ as balanced as LoL, and every one i can think of that has support roles has shields bigger and more spammable than anything janna has.
